channel.description: Recent content in tutorial on Matt Waite's Github Site

item.title: Trying new table libraries
item.description: I am going to re-write the Sports Book chapters that use tables and I’m going to use some different libraries. library(reactable) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.0 ✓ dplyr 1.0.5 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.3 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() For this I am going to look at players who are good at a sport.
